text: Maria Vittoria "Mavie" Bardanzellu (6 April 1938 – 5 February 2022) was an Italian actress. She was born in Luras, Sardinia, Kingdom of Italy. Her best known roles were in A Question of Honour, Menage all'italiana, Carogne si nasce, Silvia e l' amore and Silvia e l’amore. Bardanzellu died on 5 February 2022, at the age of 83.Lutto a Luras e nel mondo del cinema, scomparsa l’attrice Mavie Bardanzellu ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:People from Sardinia
title: Mavie Bardanzellu
